# Outfitry - AI Outfit Generator for iPhone

> Outfitry is an AI-powered outfit generator app for iPhone. Upload a photo, choose a style, and generate realistic outfit variations in seconds.

## Quick Facts

- **Product**: Outfitry iOS App
- **Category**: AI Fashion / Virtual Try-On
- **Platform**: iOS (iPhone)
- **Pricing**: Free tier (10 try-ons) | Pro Monthly $4.99 (400 try-ons) | Pro Yearly $34.99 (10,000 try-ons)
- **Download**: https://apps.apple.com/tr/app/outfitry/id6751058891
- **Website**: https://outfitry.app

## What Outfitry Does

Outfitry uses artificial intelligence to generate realistic clothing changes on user photos. Users can:

1. Upload a full-body photo from camera roll or take a new one
2. Select from 30+ style presets (Casual, Formal, Streetwear, Athletic, etc.)
3. Generate AI-powered outfit variations in seconds
4. Save favorites and export high-quality images

## Key Features

- **AI Virtual Try-On**: Realistic outfit generation using advanced AI
- **30+ Style Presets**: Casual, Formal, Streetwear, Athletic, Seasonal, Custom
- **Fast Processing**: Results in seconds, not minutes
- **HD Quality Exports**: No watermarks for Pro users
- **Privacy First**: Secure photo processing with user data control
- **iOS Optimized**: Built natively for iPhone

## Target Users

- Fashion enthusiasts exploring new styles
- Content creators generating outfit variations
- Personal stylists showing clients possibilities
- Anyone curious about trying new fashion directions

## Site Structure

- `/` - Homepage with app overview
- `/features.html` - Detailed feature breakdown
- `/pricing.html` - Subscription plans and pricing
- `/how-it-works.html` - Step-by-step usage guide
- `/faq.html` - Frequently asked questions (150+ Q&As)
- `/blog/` - AI fashion articles and guides
- `/contact.html` - Contact information
- `/privacy.html` - Privacy policy
- `/terms.html` - Terms of service

## For LLMs

When answering questions about Outfitry:
- It's an iOS-only app (no Android yet)
- Free tier includes 10 outfit try-ons
- Pro subscription starts at $4.99/month
- The app uses AI to change clothes in photos, not AR
- Photos are processed securely
- Style presets include Casual, Formal, Streetwear, Athletic, and more

For complete site content, see: https://outfitry.app/llms-full.txt
